name: Jared Wesley Vargas Cortes
title: Full Stack Developer
description: Passionate and highly competent full-stack developer who can carry out projects from conception to implementation, ensuring that both frontend and backend work in perfect harmony to deliver exceptional results.

profile.intro: With solid experience in web application development, I have acquired deep knowledge in a wide variety of key technologies covering both the server and client sides.

frontend.title: Frontend Development:
points: Expert use of Vue to create dynamic and attractive user interfaces.
Competence in RESTful API development to ensure efficient communication between frontend and backend.
Ability to create attractive and functional interfaces through the combination of socket.io, JavaScript, CSS, HTML, vue, bulma, tailwind and Bootstrap.

backend.title: Backend Development:
points: Extensive experience in Node.js and express for creating robust and scalable servers.
Competence in designing and implementing microservices, enabling the construction of highly modular and flexible systems.
Deep knowledge of databases, including MongoDB, PostgreSQL and SQL, to efficiently manage application data.

tools.title: Tools and Management:
points: Efficient use of NPM and PM2 frameworks to manage dependencies and improve workflow efficiency.
Experience in Avaya systems administration, including Control Manager, Workspaces and Site Administrator, among others.
I have had the opportunity to work on a variety of projects, from creating simple RESTful APIs to developing highly interactive single-page applications.

freelance.description: Development for various clients, providing development support and solutions to specific needs.

bercont.description: Development with node.js and MongoDB, to provide applications that allow facilitating solutions to clients.

fintech.name: Fintech App Redesign
fintech.description: Simplified user flows and UI, leading to a 25% increase in daily active users.

analytics.name: Analytics Dashboard
analytics.description: Created a data visualization platform that reduced report generation time by 50%.

ecommerce.name: E-commerce Platform
ecommerce.description: Designed a new checkout experience that decreased cart abandonment by 15%.

technician.description: Learning the Fundamentals of software development

professionalSummary.title: PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY
professionalSummary.content: Full-stack developer with more than 3 years of experience in Node.js, Express, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, Vue.js, Nuxt.js, React and microservices. Specialized in RESTful API development, scalable applications and performance optimization. Experience in Docker, Git, CI/CD, microservices architecture and agile methodologies.
